alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin; Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 11 at 11:02PM CDT until August 11 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR FRANKLIN...SOUTHEASTERN CRAWFORD AND NORTHEASTERN SEBASTIAN COUNTIES... At 1102 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles southeast of Cass to near Wiederkehr Village to 2 miles northeast of Ratcliff to near Charleston, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Ozark... Charleston... Mulberry... Dyer... Altus... Branch... Denning... Wiederkehr Village... Bloomer... Fern... Fort Chaffee... Jethro... Turners Bend... Vesta... Cecil... Lonelm... Ursula... Etna... Alix... Barnes... This includes Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 19 and 42. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
